actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE work_team_un_credentials
SET
  is_assigned = 0,
  assigned_to_work_team_member_id = NULL,
  assigned_at = NULL,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE wtu_cred_id = {{
  (appsmith.store.wtmCredRow && appsmith.store.wtmCredRow.origin_uncred_id)
  || (tbl_wtm_creds_i.triggeredRow && tbl_wtm_creds_i.triggeredRow.origin_uncred_id)
  || (tbl_wtm_creds_i.selectedRow && tbl_wtm_creds_i.selectedRow.origin_uncred_id)
  || 0
}};
